quests.name: Acrobatics Training
quests.description: Tread the difficult path to find an expert acrobat to train you further.

quests.name: Alchemy Training
quests.description: Persuade a Master Alchemist to instruct you further.

quests.name: Alteration Training
quests.description: Prove to an Argonian master you are worthy of further training.

quests.name: Armorer Training
quests.description: Prove your smithing skills to the master.

quests.name: Athletics Training
quests.description: Prove to an expert athlete that you are well-traveled enough to receive master training.

quests.name: Blade Training
quests.description: Prove your reputation with a blade to the Master Swordsman.

quests.name: Block Training
quests.description: Demonstrate to the Master of Defense that you are proficient enough to receive her training.

quests.name: Blunt Training
quests.description: A Master in blunt skills needs to know sufficient bloodthirst to receive her training.

quests.name: Conjuration Training
quests.description: A Master Conjurer wants proof of your ability before he will train you.

quests.name: Destruction Training
quests.description: A Master of Destruction wants you to join her in challenging the gods to prove you deserve her training.

quests.name: Hand to Hand Training
quests.description: A Master of unarmed combat wants you to try to hurt him to prove you deserve his training.

quests.name: Heavy Armor Training
quests.description: A retired gladiator wants you to find a present for his beloved before he will train you.

quests.name: Illusion Training
quests.description: Supply a master illusionist with Welkynd Stones to receive her training.

quests.name: Light Armor Training
quests.description: A master of light armor wants some new armor before he will train you.

quests.name: Marksman Training
quests.description: A master marksman wants your equipment to be up to scratch before she will train you.

quests.name: Mercantile Training
quests.description: Prove to a master merchant that you have enough capital to receive her expertise.

quests.name: Mysticism Training
quests.description: You must begin to repel the forces of Oblivion before the master mystic will train you.

quests.name: Restoration Training
quests.description: A master healer will only train you if you save her city.

quests.name: Security Training
quests.description: Act as a courier for the master of security so he will train you.

quests.name: Sneak Training
quests.description: Steal an item from the master of sneak to persuade her to train you.

quests.name: Speechcraft Training
quests.description: Cyrodiil's master orator wants you to comfort the unfortunate to prove yourself worthy of her training.
